title: Charming Fully Furnished French Carriage House in Beachwood Canyon
posting_body: Tucked away in private Glen, this charming 19th century French Carriage House is located in the hills of Beachwood Canyon surrounded by lush greenery.
One bedroom and artist's loft can be used either for guests or a den.
16 foot high beamed ceilings, French doors leading onto patio, garden and pond.
Antique white wooden floors, dressing room with closet and built in Armoire.
Writer's nook opens to a roof top garden with great views of the Canyon and Glen.
Walled and gated.
One off street parking space located on a private tree lined street 2 blocks from the village and close to markets, restaurants, and the Franklin Strip.
Very European.
Unbelievably quaint.
Don't miss this charming home!!
Washer/Dryer included.
Zoned AC.
Tenant pays all utilities.
Landlord pays gardener.
Small pets permitted upon landlord approval.
Landlord may charge pet deposit and/or pet rent.
Furnished.
Also available for short term lease.
Presented by Cameron Fedderman with Compass.
Brandy Brooks
Sotheby's International Realty Los Feliz Brokerage
